00017 public:
00018     bool read(char* pointer, long long size);
00019     template <typename T> BinaryFile& operator>>(T &rhs);
00020

00045 
00046 template <typename T> BinaryFile& BinaryFile::operator<<(const T &rhs) {
00047     if (!write((char*)&rhs, sizeof(T))) {
00048         Warn("Error writing data to %c:" << rhs);
00049     }
00050 
00051     return (*this);
00052 }
00053 
00054 template <typename T> BinaryFile& BinaryFile::operator>>(T &rhs) {
00055     if (!read((char*)&rhs, sizeof(T))) {
00056         Warn("Error reading data from %c.");
00057     }
00058 
00059     return (*this);
00060 }
